title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Gaspipe Tortured Him And Shot Him 15 Times"
description: Angelo Ruggerio finds out that Gaspipe is spreading lies about him, so he asks John Gotti for permission to whack him. When the hit goes awry, Gaspipe immediately seeks revenge and won't quit until it's settled.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Angelo Ruggerio finds out that Gaspipe is spreading lies about him, so he asks John Gotti for permission to whack him. When the hit goes awry, Gaspipe immediately seeks revenge and won't quit until it's settled.
